title: How to send clip with bug to riot
body: Tell me how to send it?/

replies.body:
GUIDELINES
Culture

This is an official Riot Channel. We have dedicated Rioters here to help address any technical issues or any other League-related questions you have, so feel free to create a discussion and ask! Also, make sure to check out our Knowledge Base, which has in-depth articles with solutions for most issues. If it’s serious enough, you’ll still want to submit a ticket the old-fashioned way.

Etiquette

DO NOT post content regarding account suspensions here. Submit a ticket instead.

DO NOT post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our Report a Bug board.


just scroll to the bottom,it's to the left

You can send us clips by creating a[ support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  There will be an option available to attach content.  Your best bet for bug related reports would be the [Bug Report ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)boards, though and not player support.  In that case, you can try uploading it to a video service provide like Youtube and link it in your thread.
